definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Is also a "five-spice powder" raw materials.
In the chapter 3 , it summarize the characteristics of the customary law.
sentences.chinese: 第三章總結了香粉鄉習慣法的特點。

sentences.english: I caught a faint odour of violet sachet .
sentences.chinese: 我聞到一股紫羅蘭香粉的淡淡的清香味兒。

sentences.english: He also noticed that her face was heavily powdered.
sentences.chinese: 他還注意到她抹滿厚厚一層香粉的臉。

sentences.english: "Yeah, and powder, and lotion, and shampoo, " adds Corinne.
sentences.chinese: “是呀，還有香粉，潤膚露，洗髮水，”科琳補充道。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in mandarin juice and five spice.
sentences.chinese: 離火後加入柑橘汁及五香粉。

sentences.english: When she sighed she exhaled a heavy perfume of sachet powder.
sentences.chinese: 她嘆息的時候，呼出濃重的香粉的香氣。

sentences.english: Buy five spice powder in the Chinese supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 中國超市可以買到五香粉。

sentences.english: He preferred to be dusted with scented powder and washed his face with a rag soaked in alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 他更喜歡往山上拍香粉，或者用布沾着酒精擦臉。

definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
cardamom (Elettaria cardamomum)/fig. a girl's teenage years/maidenhood/a budding beauty
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
